name: The Van Verse of Starry Footballers

metadata.name: Van Partey (GHA)
metadata.description:
The Van Verse of Starry Footballers is a first of itâ€™s kind immersive art composition that gathers 32 unique NFT variants of the best footballers leading their nations to conquer Qatar's 2022 World Cup, as if Van Gogh had painted them himself in his famous masterpiece "Starry Night Over The Rhone".

The total supply of 200 "Van Partey (GHA)" NFTs can be mint for FREE at https://app.manifold.xyz/c/tvv-starry-footballers-van-partey.

The immersive experience is available at https://go.thevanverse.com/starry-footballers, where the owned NFTs turn alive with motion in ultra HD detail, accompanied with vibrant music that transports you to The Van Verse.

50% of the sales + royalties made by this collection by the end of the World Cup, will be split and airdropped to addresses that holds the full collection of 32 footballers.
